adv.js: { //local effect }} > {children}

action_function.valueBuilt: async()=>{let a=await db.m_user.findFirst({where:{email:local.email}});a?bcrypt.compareSync(local.old_pass,a.password)===!0?(local.access=!0,local.user_id=a.id,local.render()):alert("Invalid Password, Try Again"):alert("Invalid Email, Try Again")};

async()=>{if(local.new_pass!==null&&local.confirm_pass!==null&&local.confirm_pass===local.new_pass){let l=bcrypt.genSaltSync(10),a=bcrypt.hashSync(local.confirm_pass,l);await db.m_user.update({where:{id:Number(local.user_id),email:local.email},data:{password:a}})?(alert("Your password has changed"),navigate("/auth/login"),local.old_pass=null,local.email=null,local.confirm_pass=null,local.new_pass=null,local.user_id=null,local.access=!1,local.render()):alert("An error occuring")}else alert("Check your new password or confirmation password")};
